pitch: Hi Mayor! I'm Jordan. Congratulations on the election! I'm here to propose speeding up your city's development by investing in tokenized Real World Assets (RWA). Take time to study the market!
faq_1_a: A 'Real World Asset'. It's a tangible physical asset (like real estate or a business) whose shares are transformed into digital tokens on the blockchain.
faq_2_a: It's the action of splitting a real-world contract into thousands of small digital tickets, allowing investment with just a few dollars.
faq_3_a: Annual Percentage Yield. It's the estimated annual return your investment will generate continuously in your Vault.
